game.name: Cosminers
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, Co-op, Online Co-op, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: 코스마이너스는 낮/밤 주기를 기반으로 하는 1~4인 협동 FPP 공상 과학 건물, 채굴 및 생존 게임입니다. 절차적으로 생성되는 지하에서 채굴하고, 외계인과 싸우고, 장비를 업그레이드하며 끝없이 스릴 넘치는 게임 플레이를 즐겨보세요.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Cosminers is a 1-4 player co-op FPP sci-fi building and mining game with survival elements based on day/night cycle. As a space miner kill various aliens on procedurally-generated planet's undergrounds. Craft and upgrade your tools, weapons & base to get countless hours of thrilling gameplay.
